hover.dfwaypoints.info.create.name: Waypoint Name:
message.dfwaypoints.error.create.not_on_: You must be on a plot to create waypoints!
message.dfwaypoints.error.create.not_in_: Because of your config, you must be in dev/build mode to create waypoints.
message.dfwaypoints.error.create.waypoin: You already have a waypoint with this name!
message.dfwaypoints.error.create.could_n: DFWaypoints ran into an issue saving waypoint data. Your waypoint has been created, but may not save upon closing the game.
message.dfwaypoints.error.position.not_o: You must be on a plot to set the position of waypoints!
message.dfwaypoints.error.list.not_on_pl: You must be on a plot to list your waypoints!
message.dfwaypoints.error.delete.not_on_: You must be on a plot to delete waypoints!
message.dfwaypoints.error.delete.could_n: DFWaypoints ran into an issue saving waypoint data. Your waypoint has been deleted, but may not save upon closing the game.
message.dfwaypoints.error.teleport.not_o: You must be on a plot to teleport to waypoints!
message.dfwaypoints.error.teleport.not_i: You must be in dev/build mode to teleport to waypoints!
message.dfwaypoints.error.appearance.not: You must be on a plot to edit the appearance of waypoints!
config.dfwaypoints.title: DFWaypoints Config
config.dfwaypoints.category.general.tool: General config options that don't fit into other categories.
config.dfwaypoints.general.allow_creatio: Allows waypoint creation outside of editor modes. Creating waypoints on plots you won't edit will take up unnecessary space.
config.dfwaypoints.rendering.default_way: The default state for the waypoint "Render" option.
The default color for the waypoint "Color" option.
config.dfwaypoints.rendering.default_tex: The default color for the waypoint "Text Color" option.
The default color for the waypoint "Text Outline Color" option.
config.dfwaypoints.rendering.show_waypoi: Shows a tip reading "[Keybind] Warp" when looking towards a waypoint.
config.dfwaypoints.rendering.waypoint_hu: Shows a list of waypoints the player is looking at on the HUD.
config.dfwaypoints.rendering.show_lookwa: Shows a tip reading "[Keybind] Warp" when looking towards a waypoint.
config.dfwaypoints.category.waypoints.to: Configure your waypoints for this plot.
config.dfwaypoints.waypoints.render_wayp: Shows this waypoint in the world and on the HUD if you are looking in its general direction.
config.dfwaypoints.waypoints.waypoint_co: The color this waypoint's icon is rendered in.
The color this waypoint's name is rendered in.
config.dfwaypoints.waypoints.text_outlin: The color this waypoint's name outline is rendered in.
